name_abbreviation: Borough of Downingtown v. Friends of Kardon Park

parties: BOROUGH OF DOWNINGTOWN and Council of the Borough of Downingtown v. FRIENDS OF KARDON PARK, Ann M. Feldman, Marion Ungrich, Evelyn Hopkins, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2013, the Application for Post-Submission Communication is GRANTED. The Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

March 21, 2013.
